message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $850000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $825000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $795000. Can you consider this price?

I'm starting to think we're close, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get at least $810000 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. I'm getting close to my budget, but I'd like to try to get a bit closer to the target price. I'd be willing to go up to $805000. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $820000, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product. If you're still interested, I'm willing to meet you at this price.

I understand you're not willing to go any lower than $820000, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at that price, but I need to make sure my manager is okay with it. Can you confirm that $820000 is the absolute lowest you're willing to go?
